name: HOT MILK; 2% Alive
description:
HOT MILK; 2% alive is a game where you play as an 80's protagonist who was kidnapped and tied to a chair. It is your goal to get revenge on the milk and chair CEO who did this to you, all while you're rooted to the chair. 

Disclaimer: This game was made during a game jam and has a lot of missing art (example: cutscenes and some obstacle art in later scenes)

Keyboard Controls:

Mouse: Aim with the mouse, click and hold RMB to charge up a jump

A: Rotate left

D: Rotate right

Controller Controls:

Trigger: Hold to charge up a jump

Right Stick: Aim

Left Stick: Rotate

ALT-F4 to leave the game

Global Game Jam 2023 Game Page: https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/hot-milk-2-alive-3

Credits: 

Kylar Black: Designer

Weston Wright: Designer

Rylie Parker: Artist

Fernando Valadez: Audio
